articles.description: We have ridden the new Hero Karizma XMR. Is it a worthy successor to the original. Check out our quick review to know more.
articles.content: The ride quality is tuned more towards comfort than outright handling. A little bouncy at first, the rear monoshock settles nicely at high speeds, good for cruising comfort

articles.title: Small cap stock below ₹10: Penny stock Vikas Lifecare offers preferential shares at ₹4 apiece to raise ₹40 crore | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Penny stock below 10 rupees: Small-cap company's board of directors has approved issuing 10 crore preferential shares at  ₹4 apiece
articles.content: Small-cap stock below 10:Vikas Lifecare shares are one of the penny stocks under 10 rupees and the small-cap stock may have more stock float in coming times. The board of directors of the penny stock… [+2701 chars]
